cards.name: Art Project
cards.text: Play: Unforge an opponent’s key. If you do, purge Art Project, and your opponent draws 10 cards.

cards.name: Azuretooth
cards.text:

After Fight/After Reap: Move each  from a friendly creature to your pool. Give control of that creature to your opponent.

cards.name: Curse of Spontaneity
cards.text:
Treachery. (This card enters play under your opponent’s control.)
At the start of your "draw cards" step, discard your hand.

cards.name: Cursed Relic
cards.text:
Enhance . 
You cannot play Cursed Relic.

Treachery.  (This card enters play under your opponent’s control.)

cards.name: Flea Market

cards.name: Freelancer
cards.text:
At the start of each turn, the active player takes control of this creature.
This creature may be used as if it belonged to the active house.

cards.name: Grisly Exchange
cards.text: Play: Put the top 5 cards of your opponent's discard pile on the bottom of their deck. Discard the top 5 cards of your deck.

cards.name: Put in a Spin
cards.text: Play: Lose 1. If you do, choose a house and discard the top card of your opponent’s deck. If that card belongs to the named house, gain 4.

cards.name: Skreel Swarm

Play: Deal 1 to each enemy creature.
Scrap: You may archive Skreel Swarm from your discard pile.

cards.name: Talent Scout
cards.text:
Versatile. (This card may be used as if it belonged to the active house.)

cards.name: Fortune Reverser

This creature's text box is considered blank, except for traits.

cards.name: Pen Pal
cards.text: Action: Exhaust an enemy creature. If you do, each player gains 1.

If you are haunted, Helichopper gets +3 power for each  on it.

X is the combined total of  between each player’s pools.

Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)

Ether Spider deals no damage when fighting.

Elusive.

Play: Capture 10 from any combination of players. Then, if Crassosaurus has fewer than 10 on it, purge Crassosaurus.

cards.name: Enlist Numeri
cards.text: Play: Take control of an enemy creature with  on it. While under your control, it belongs to house Saurian. (Instead of its original house.)

cards.name: Favor of Rex
cards.text: Play: Resolve the play effect of a creature as if you had just played it.

cards.name: Grimlocus Dux
cards.text:
Taunt.
Play: Exalt Grimlocus Dux twice.

cards.name: Imperial Forge
cards.text: Play: Forge a key at +8 current cost, reduced by 1 for each  on friendly creatures.

cards.name: Imperial Road
cards.text: Omni: Play a Saurian creature. That creature enters play stunned.

cards.name: Magistrate Crispus
cards.text: At the end of your turn, each player takes control of each creature and artifact they own.

cards.name: Optio Gorkus
cards.text:
Elusive. 
Each of Optio Gorkus’s neighbors gains, “Destroyed: Move each  on this creature to a neighboring Optio Gorkus.”

cards.name: Patronage
cards.text: Play: Move half the  from a creature to your pool (rounding up). Move the remaining  from that creature to your opponent’s pool.

cards.name: Saurus Rex
cards.text: After Fight/After Reap: If Saurus Rex is in the center of your battleline, you may exalt it. If you do, search your deck for a Saurian card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Senator Bracchus
cards.text:
You may spend  on friendly creatures as if it were in your pool.
After Fight/After Reap: Exalt Senator Bracchus.

cards.name: Tertiate
cards.text: Play: Destroy one third of all enemy creatures and one third of all friendly creatures (rounding up each time).

cards.name: Chaosodon
cards.text:
Splash-attack 3. (When this creature attacks, also deal 3 to each of the attacked creature’s neighbors.)
Before Fight: Deal 3 to each of Chaosodon’s neighbors.

cards.name: Dark Centurion
cards.text:
Enhance . 
Action: Move 1 from a creature to the common supply. If you do, ward that creature.

cards.name: Exile
cards.text: Play: Give control of a friendly creature to your opponent.

cards.name: Gargantodon
cards.text:
Gargantodon enters play stunned.
Gargantodon only deals 4 when fighting.
Each  that would be stolen is captured by a creature controlled by the active player instead.

cards.name: Orator Hissaro
cards.text:
Deploy.
Play: Ready and exalt each of Orator Hissaro’s neighbors. For the remainder of the turn, they belong to house Saurian.

cards.name: Pax Sauriana
cards.text: Play: Ward each creature.

cards.name: Philophosaurus
cards.text: After Reap: You may look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Archive 1, add 1 to your hand, and discard 1.

cards.name: Regrettable Meteor
cards.text: Play: Destroy each Dinosaur creature and each creature with power 6 or higher.

cards.name: Sic Semper Tyrannosaurus
cards.text: Play: Move each  from the most powerful creature to your pool and destroy that creature.

cards.name: Stomp
cards.text: Play: Deal 5 to a creature. If this damage destroys that creature, exalt a friendly creature.

cards.name: The Callipygian Ideal
cards.text:
This creature gains, “You may spend  on this creature as if it were in your pool.”
Play: Exalt this creature.

cards.name: Æmbrosia Outpost
cards.text: Action: Put a friendly creature on the bottom of its owner’s deck. If you do, move 1 from a friendly creature to your pool.

cards.name: Citizen Shrix
cards.text: Play/After Reap: Exalt Citizen Shrix. Steal 1.

cards.name: Cornicen Octavia
cards.text: Action: Capture 2.

cards.name: Epic Poem
cards.text: Play: Exalt a friendly creature. Gain 1 for each  on that creature.

cards.name: Faust the Great
cards.text:
Your opponent’s keys cost +1 for each friendly creature with  on it.
Play: You may exalt a friendly creature.

cards.name: Lapisaurus
cards.text:
Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)
While attacking Lapisaurus, enemy creatures gain, “Before Fight: Exalt this creature.”

cards.name: Odoac the Patrician
cards.text:
While Odoac the Patrician has  on it, your  cannot be stolen.
Play: Capture 1.

cards.name: Ostracize
cards.text: Play: Lose 1. If you do, purge a creature.

cards.name: Pale Into Insignificance
cards.text: Play: Destroy each creature with the lowest power.

cards.name: Praefectus Ludo
cards.text: Each other friendly creature gains, “Destroyed: Move each  from this creature to the common supply.”

cards.name: The Golden Spiral
cards.text: Action: Exalt a friendly creature. Ready and use that creature.

cards.name: Tribute
cards.text: Play: The most powerful friendly creature captures 2. You may exalt that creature to repeat the preceding effect.

cards.name: Tricerian Legionary
cards.text:
Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)
Play: Ward a friendly creature.

cards.name: Bulleteye
cards.text:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
After Reap: Destroy a flank creature.

cards.name: Finch Cloak
cards.text: After Fight/After Reap: If you have less  than your opponent, steal 1. Otherwise, each player gains 1.

cards.name: Finishing Blow
cards.text: Play: Destroy a damaged creature. If you do, steal 1.

cards.name: Gambling Den
cards.text: At the start of each player’s turn, that player may choose a house. If they do, reveal the top card of their deck. If it is of the chosen house, they gain 2. Otherwise, they lose 2.

cards.name: Mack the Knife
cards.text:
Elusive. Versatile.
Action: Deal 1 to a creature. If this damage destroys that creature, gain 1.

cards.name: Manchego
cards.text:
Play: If you have 5 or fewer cards in your deck, steal 2.
After Fight/After Reap: You may shuffle Manchego into your deck.

cards.name: Masterplan
cards.text:
Play: Put a card from your hand facedown under Masterplan.
Omni: Play the card under Masterplan. Destroy Masterplan.

cards.name: Mole
cards.text: This creature gains, “Your opponent may spend  on this creature as if it were in their pool.”

cards.name: One Last Job
cards.text: Play: Purge each friendly Shadows creature. Steal 1 for each creature purged this way.

cards.name: Rigged Lottery
cards.text: Play: Each player discards the top 5 cards of their deck. For each Shadows card discarded, its owner gains 1.

cards.name: Sack of Coins
cards.text: Play: Deal 1 to a creature for each  you have.

cards.name: Scowly Caper
cards.text:
Skirmish. Treachery. Versatile.
At the end of your turn, destroy 1 of Scowly Caper’s neighbors.

cards.name: Splinter
cards.text: Enhance . (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)

cards.name: The Quiet Anvil
cards.text:
Keys cost –2.
After a player forges a key, destroy The Quiet Anvil.

cards.name: The Shadow Council
cards.text:
Elusive. 
While The Shadow Council is in the center of your battleline, it gains, “Action: Steal 2.”

cards.name: Brend the Fanatic
cards.text:
Skirmish.
Play: Your opponent gains 1.
Destroyed: Steal 3.

cards.name: Chain Gang
cards.text:
After you play Subtle Chain, ready Chain Gang. 
Action: Steal 1. Shuffle a Subtle Chain from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Lights Out
cards.text: Play: Return 2 enemy creatures to their owner’s hand.

cards.name: Macis Asp
cards.text:
Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.)
Poison. (Any damage dealt by this creature’s power during a fight destroys the damaged creature.)

cards.name: Magda the Rat
cards.text:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
Play: Steal 2. If Magda the Rat leaves play, your opponent steals 2.

cards.name: Mooncurser
cards.text:
Skirmish. Poison.
After Fight: Steal 1.

cards.name: Murkens
cards.text: Play: Choose a random card in your opponent’s archives or the top card of your opponent’s deck. Play that card as if it were yours.

cards.name: Oubliette
cards.text: Play: Purge a creature with power 3 or lower.

cards.name: Speed Sigil
cards.text: The first creature played each turn enters play ready.

cards.name: Subtle Chain
cards.text: Play: Your opponent discards a random card from their hand.

cards.name: Too Much to Protect
cards.text:
Play: Steal all but 6 of your
opponent’s .

cards.name: “Borrow”
cards.text: Play: Take control of an enemy artifact. While under your control, it belongs to house Shadows. (Instead of its original house.)

cards.name: A. Vinda
cards.text: After Reap: Deal 1 to a creature. If this damage destroys that creature, your opponent discards a random card from their hand.

cards.name: Bo Nithing
cards.text: Play: Steal 1 for each forged key your opponent has.

cards.name: Hit and Run
cards.text: Play: Deal 2 to a creature. Return a friendly creature to your hand.

cards.name: Hugger-Mugger
cards.text:
Elusive.
Play: Capture 1. Then, if your opponent has more forged keys than you, steal 1.

cards.name: J. Vinda
cards.text:
Elusive.
After Reap: Deal 1 to a creature. If this damage destroys that creature, steal 1.

cards.name: Life for a Life
cards.text: Play: Destroy a friendly creature. If you do, deal 6 to a creature.

cards.name: Miasma
cards.text: Play: Your opponent skips the “forge a key” step during their next turn.

cards.name: Nerve Blast
cards.text: Play: Steal 1. If you do, deal 2 to a creature.

cards.name: Ronnie Wristclocks
cards.text: Play: Steal 1. If your opponent has 7 or more, steal 2 instead.

cards.name: Seeker Needle
cards.text: Action: Deal 1 to a creature. If this damage destroys that creature, gain 1.

cards.name: Shoulder Id
cards.text:
Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)
Shoulder Id cannot fight.
When Shoulder Id would deal damage, steal 1 instead.

cards.name: Vandalize
cards.text: Play: Look at the top 3 cards of your opponent’s deck. Discard 1 and put the others back in any order.

cards.name: Awful Atoll
cards.text:
While a player is haunted, their creatures get –2 power.
If there are no creatures in play, destroy Awful Atoll.

cards.name: Corrode
cards.text:
Play: Choose one:
Destroy an artifact.
Destroy an upgrade.
Destroy a creature with armor.

cards.name: Drawn Down
cards.text: Play: Look at the top 3 cards of your opponent’s deck. Discard 1, put 1 on the bottom of their deck, and put 1 on top of their deck.

cards.name: Flash Freeze
cards.text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, after you play another card, exhaust a creature.

cards.name: General Sherman
cards.text:
General Sherman deals no damage when fighting.
Play: Purge each other creature. If General Sherman leaves play, return to play each creature purged this way (exhausted and under its owner’s control).

cards.name: Giltspine Mesmerist
cards.text:
After a player readies a card, discard the top card of their deck.
Scrap: Discard the top 3 cards of a player's deck.

cards.name: Llack Gaboon
cards.text: Llack Gaboon gets +1 power for each other exhausted creature. If there are 3 or more other exhausted creatures, Llack Gaboon gains skirmish and hazardous 5.

cards.name: Omnipus
cards.text:
Omnipus cannot fight.
Play: Discard the top 8 cards of your deck. Play each Tentaclid from your discard pile.
After Reap: Gain 1 for each friendly Tentaclid.

cards.name: Sibyl Waimare
cards.text: At the start of your opponent’s turn, that player discards the top card of their deck and exhausts each creature of that card’s house.

cards.name: Taniwha
cards.text: After Fight/After Reap: Destroy a friendly creature and gain 1.

cards.name: Thalassophobia
cards.text: Play: Discard the top 10 cards of your opponent’s deck.

cards.name: The Chosen One
cards.text: Instead of readying creatures they control during their “ready cards” step, your opponent deals 1 to The Chosen One for each exhausted creature they control.

cards.name: Thing from the Deep
cards.text:
Thing from the Deep cannot be played unless Open the Seal is in your discard pile.
After Fight: Steal 2.

cards.name: Unsettling Ancestry
cards.text: Play: Stun and exhaust an enemy creature. If you are haunted, archive Unsettling Ancestry.

cards.name: Whirlpool
cards.text: At the end of each player’s turn, that player gives control of the creature on their right flank to their opponent and moves it to that player’s left flank.

cards.name: Allusions of Grandeur
cards.text: Play: Choose a house on your opponent’s identity card. If your opponent does not choose that house as their active house on their next turn, gain 3.

cards.name: Catch and Release
cards.text: Play: Return each creature to its owner’s hand. Each player discards random cards from their hand until they have 6 or fewer cards in hand. Gain 2 chains.

cards.name: Dirge of the Deep
cards.text:
Enhance .
Play: Discard the bottom card of your opponent’s deck. Exhaust each creature that shares a house with that card.

cards.name: Fuguru
cards.text:
Poison.
Your opponent refills their hand to 1 less card during their “draw cards” step.

cards.name: Gatewatcher
cards.text:
Taunt.
Destroyed: If your opponent is haunted, destroy each enemy flank creature.

cards.name: Hukaru Icefin
cards.text:
After Reap: Choose a house. Exhaust each creature of that house.
Scrap: Exhaust a creature or an artifact.

cards.name: Kaupe
cards.text: Your opponent cannot play more than 1 card of each card type (action, artifact, creature, upgrade) each turn.

cards.name: Kelping Hands
cards.text: Omni: Destroy Kelping Hands. For the remainder of the turn, each friendly creature gains poison.

cards.name: Physaloha
cards.text:
Enhance . (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)
Damaged creatures do not ready during the “ready cards” step.

cards.name: Sleep with the Fishes
cards.text: Play: Destroy each exhausted creature.

cards.name: Thundertow
cards.text: Play: Exhaust 2 creatures. Deal 2 to each exhausted creature.

cards.name: Under Pressure
cards.text: This creature cannot ready.

cards.name: Abyssal Sight
cards.text: Play: Destroy a friendly creature. If you do, look at your opponent’s hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

cards.name: Adult Swim
cards.text: Play: Put each creature with power 3 or lower on top of its owner’s deck in a random order.

cards.name: Brain Drain
cards.text: Play: Look at your opponent’s hand. Choose a card from it and put it on top of their deck.

cards.name: Covetous Hema
cards.text:
While Covetous Hema is not on a flank, it gains elusive.
Play: Capture 3.

cards.name: Echoing Deathknell
cards.text: Play: Deal 1 to each creature. If one or more creatures are destroyed this way, repeat this effect.

cards.name: Koriki Germinator
cards.text: Play/After Reap: Put a card from a player's discard pile on the bottom of their deck.

cards.name: Mnemoleech
cards.text: After Reap: If your opponent is haunted, steal 2. Otherwise, steal 1.

cards.name: Mælstrom
cards.text: Play: Put each creature on top of its owner’s deck in a random order. Gain 2 chains.

cards.name: Skullback Crab
cards.text:
Poison. (Any damage dealt by this creature’s power during a fight destroys the damaged creature.)
Action: Steal 1.

cards.name: Tangimangi
cards.text: While your opponent is haunted, their keys cost +3.

cards.name: Trawler
cards.text: Play: If you are haunted, capture all your opponent’s .

cards.name: “Bubbles”
cards.text: Play: Put an enemy creature on top of its owner’s deck.

cards.name: Open the Seal
cards.text: Enhance . (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)

cards.name: Dark Discovery
cards.text: Play: Name 2 cards. Discard the bottom 2 cards of your opponent’s deck. If they are the named cards, purge Dark Discovery and forge a key at no cost.

cards.name: Dive Deep
cards.text: Play: Discard the top card of your opponent’s deck. Put a creature that shares a house with that card on the bottom of its owner’s deck.

cards.name: Tentaclid
cards.text:
Skirmish. Taunt.
Tentaclid cannot reap.

cards.name: Ghostform
cards.text:
This creature gains invulnerable. (It cannot be destroyed or dealt damage.)
This creature gains, “After Fight/After Reap: Archive Ghostform.”

cards.name: Infomancer
cards.text:
Elusive.
Play: Graft an action card from your hand onto Infomancer. (Place it faceup under this card.)
After Reap: Resolve the play effect of an action card grafted onto Infomancer.

th.name: อินโฟแมนเซอร์

cards.name: Lateral Shift
cards.text: Play: Look at your opponent’s hand. Play a card from that hand as if it were yours.

cards.name: Memolith
cards.text: Action: Graft an action card from your hand onto Memolith (place it faceup under this card), or resolve the play effect of an action card grafted onto Memolith.

cards.name: Nizak, The Forgotten
cards.text:
While fighting, Nizak, The Forgotten gains invulnerable. (It cannot be destroyed or dealt damage.)
After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Nizak, The Forgotten, return that creature to its owner’s hand.

th.name: นิซแซคผู้ถูกลืม

cards.name: Timequake
cards.text: Play: Shuffle each friendly card in play into your deck. Draw a card for each card shuffled into your deck this way.

th.name: มิติเวลาสั่นสะเทือน

cards.name: The Constant
cards.text:
Each player skips their ”draw cards” step.
At the start of your turn, remove a time counter from The Constant, then destroy it if there are no time counters on it.
Play: Put 2 time counters on The Constant.

cards.name: Antanagoge
cards.text:
Play: You may graft an enemy creature onto Antanagoge. 
After Reap: Deal damage to each creature equal to the power of a creature grafted onto Antanagoge.

cards.name: Cosmicrux
cards.text: After a player readies a creature, deal 1 to it.

cards.name: Help From Another Self
cards.text: Play: Search your deck and discard pile for a Variant creature, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

cards.name: Ignitus
cards.text: Ignitus gains splash-attack X, where X is the number of exhausted creatures.

cards.name: Omega TT
cards.text:
Play: Purge 2 cards from a discard pile.
Action: Shuffle Omega TT into its owner’s deck.

cards.name: Thermal Depletion
cards.text: Play: Until the start of your next turn, creatures cannot ready.

cards.name: Treok, The Wise
cards.text: After Reap: Choose a creature. Until the start of your next turn, that creature gains invulnerable. (It cannot be destroyed or dealt damage.)
